source_sentence: Recent Legacy rock chip results (ASX announcement 26 February 2025) include 30% Sb and 0.38g/t Au (Sample 9979) from their Lunatic Prospect, which is 2.2km from Drake East (Figure 2).
resource_context: Legacy Drake Project - Lunatic Prospect - Rock chip sample
